resources.string: Here we create a multiple owner ViewModel(containing color data) with this activity, In this way we can share data between fragments and even activities, ViewModel stays alive while it has at least one owner alive. \nClick on activity or fragments to change ViewModel value

Here we create a single owner ViewModel(containing color data) with this activity, this approach is exactly same as google arch ViewModel implementation, here we bind our ViewModel to the activity, so fragments share host activity\'s ViewModel
This type of ViewModel has no owner and belongs to the application scope, It stays alive while at least one activity of the application is alive!
